tweets.text: SSSI destruction, todays shocking event, jail? that costs us money, land should be taken, that is a punishment which would stop this, not the river margin, much bigger area. They would probably beg for jail time, but that costs us money.

@TamFinkelstein And so much more besides, @TamFinkelstein... Smartphone as river/flood flow measurement device...? Yep, we have that now! Huge potential for @EnvAgency staff responding to flood incidents + citizen science etc @flowonthegoltd @UK_CEH https://t.co/RWULU3samu

We've successfully tested the new demountable defences at the Memorial Gardens installed as part of #YorkFAS to help reduce the risk of flooding & make sure we are prepared for winter.

Over ¬£45m has been invested in better protection for 2,000 local homes & business in #York https://t.co/GH35tUc5fO
Today @GroundControlGC started the weed cutting on the River Eau in Scotter for @EnvAgency. Steady progress made despite rainy conditions. https://t.co/mlaBGm8mNU

tweets.text:
The first beaver dam in over 400 years appeared on Exmoor after beavers were released into the wild in January.

These rodents can play an important role in engineering the landscape and helping to restore streams and reduce #flooding.

Learn more: https://t.co/h7VascPfWg

urls.title: Beavers build first Exmoor dam in 400 years
urls.description: The National Trust says the dam in Somerset "might look modest, but it is incredibly special".

tweets.text: The Redesdale Valley may be a less well known part of #Northumberland but the @OurRedesdale brings to light its  rich cultural heritage, landscape and wildlife. Listen in to #OpenCountry at 3.00pm to discover more. @HelenMark01  @NlandNP @NorthWildlife  @HeritageFundNOR https://t.co/v0nEvdI1Kj

We @WildlifeTrusts will be following it very carefully https://t.co/YZpRTggpl4

tweets.text: @ian_blewett @HelenStace_HWT @Feargal_Sharkey Some good people in @EnvAgency just not enough of them because of massive budget cuts. They are on the case, but we are watching.

This is just a few miles from Longmeadow. It breaks my heart but is all too-typical of the ignorance, arrogance and sheer wanton destruction of those privileged to care for our countryside.

Horror at destruction of nationally important UK river  https://t.co/6uTt85hYaF

tweets.text:
Our officers worked with Durham Constabulary last week to detain three suspected poachers. 

The men were using a 1.5m gaff to illegally spear salmon and trout spawning in shallow waters. Read more, including how to report poaching: https://t.co/UhZgPenmlW https://t.co/3MXLnVFDFx

tweets.text: Well done @JoRobb5 for co-ordinating the inaugural meeting of the Thames Valley Rivers Network this morning. Good to hear from @thameswater @EnvAgency and campaigners and discuss next steps in the fight for cleaner rivers with cllrs and officers from other local authorities.

Incomprehensible this amount of work proceeded without the intervention of @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency To not deal with this robustly will be a mockery to the determined efforts by @WildlifeTrusts @theriverstrust @WildTroutTrust @SalmonTroutCons & others to protect our rivers https://t.co/S5bYnqGTJi

tweets.text: @darrenpjones @EnvAgency @H_S_E Should we also be asking about the exposure to risk for people living nearby? Avonmouth has a lot of waste processing, as well as other toxic materials, all packed together in one small area. It's asking for widespread trouble if explosions like these continue unchecked.

tweets.text:
I've often ask the question "And the @EnvAgency does what exactly?"

Transpires we now have an answer. It's not a lot.

"The Environment Agency attended just 292 water pollution incidents, down from 1,726 during the same period in 2019". @bilgribs 

https://t.co/Hbcmxyl5pI

urls.title: Environment Agency slashes number of water pollution incident visits
urls.description: Huge drop in number of visits during Covid crisis raises concerns polluters are breaking laws with impunity

Over the next few weeks work will progress on the construction of the site compound for the #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme.
